data.actual_result: The text has more space at the bottom than the top.
data.expected_result: The text "Are you sure you want to leave <insert server name here>? You won't be able to rejoin this server unless you are reinvited." isn't centered horizontally
data.short_description: The text in the leave server modal isn't centered vertically (the server name too for some devices)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server. - Click on the 3 dots. - Click on leave server. - Observe the server name.
